entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 11:00 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.5°C
Wind: SSW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle early in the morning. Periods of rain beginning in the morning then changing to 40 percent chance of drizzle in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
